column4: Is there a way to tell the "rescue" option to boot from a partition I choose ?
can you point me to a web page with info on the ubuntu "rescue" options (9.10) ?
you just select it and it will eventually come to a list of actions you can then perform
I have "boot from first hard disk"
I don't have an option for "Rescue"
I am talking about LiveCD boot.
grub on the hard disk is a mess.
you need an alternate cd to get that option
I don't know what's faster: reinstall + update or download alternate....
IMHO an alternate cd is always better than the live one
